dialogue.text: Yo, this is gonna be totally skibidi: integration is literally the most sigma way to find area under curves, and it's absolutely rizzing with infinite calculations!
Bruh, that's cap! How do you even find area under a curve? And what's this Ohio infinite stuff you're talking about?
Listen fam, imagine yeeting the area into infinite thin rectangles, then adding all their areas. That's integration! It's giving main character energy with this magic math!
That's straight up sus! How can you add infinite rectangles? Wouldn't that be giving NPC behavior trying to calculate forever?
Nah bestie, that's the alpha move of calculus! We use limits to handle the infinity. It's like having the ultimate cheat code for impossible math!
This is absolutely fire! So integration can find areas of the most sigma shapes that basic geometry could never? Calculus is literally the GOAT mathematical superpower!
